comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: What a wonderfully odd photograph! It takes that one step beyond documenting the zoo (which is definitely interesting -- we've become so much accustomed to our modern naturalistic zoo habitats that the previous zoo forms look foreign now) into the absurd.

comment.author: 61361160@N00
comment._content: This photograph is part of the Indicommons.org "across the Commons" feature Animal Magnetism across the Commons. (Thanks, Criz!)

comment.author: 35310696@N04
comment._content: Thank you, that's great to see!
